scripts.db:drop: node settings/reset_confirmation.js "⚠️ WARNING: This will DROP the database. Type 'yes' to continue: " && npx sequelize-cli db:drop
scripts.db:reset: node settings/reset_confirmation.js "⚠️ WARNING: This will RESET the database. Type 'yes' to continue: " && npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path database/migrations/alter && node database/utility/generateModels.js
